duties_responsibilities.duty: Support an assigned book of business by providing strong day-to-day service that focuses on our clients’ needs and issues as they arise.
Develop processes and improvements that will help our team be more effective, either internally or with our clients.
Represent the voice of our client internally to ensure we deliver products and services that meet their needs.
Hold and facilitate regular discussions with clients to address urgent or escalated issues, requests, and/or asks quickly and effectively.
Partner closely with your Client Support team to service our clients day-to-day and resolve any issues that may come up.
Track and monitor all client requests and/or issues in order to ensure quick resolution (along with helping to identify trends or patterns in the issues being tracked).

education_certification.credential: Minimum 3-5 years account management or customer service experience, preferably within healthcare industry
